oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Bill Frist to Benjamin L. Hooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Frist, Bill; Tennessee Human Rights Commission;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from Senator Bill Frist congratulating Benjamin L. Hooks on his appointment as Chairman of the Tennessee Human Rights Commission.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frist, Bill
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Matthew Hicks and Katie Jakovich; Donated by Patricia Hooks Gray;
